products.name: M187 Wireless Mini Mouse

It features a Fast Ethernet port and delivers speeds up to 733Mbps, making this great for extending network coverage to Wi-Fi dead zones. As you move around your home, with Mesh Smart Roaming, your mobile device automatically connects to the strongest Wi-Fi signal.

products.description: Turn one USB-C port into four USB-A 3.0 ports with the Targus USB-C to 4-Port USB-A Hub. Connect your USB-A peripherals – like mice, keyboards, flash drives and hard drives - by plugging in up to four devices in the USB-A ports and connecting the tethered USB cable into your computer's USB-C port. This hub provides transfer speeds up to 5Gbps
